name: Super Chase H.Q.
overview: RACE AGAINST CRIME! The hottest Super NES driving game comes to Game Boy! Feel your muscles clench and your nerves stretch as you race through cities and traffic jams in pursuit of fleeing suspects. Pull them over or run them down - at these speeds, either method is effective! This is the car chase of all time, with you at the wheel! Turbo acceleration for ultra speeds! Seven rounds of hair-raising chasing! Can be linked up for two players!
